events.title: Boot Scootin' BBQ 2019
events.description: Our spring fundraiser featuring BBQ and western-themed entertainment. Despite the rain, we had a full crowd turn out to support our cause, demonstrating the strong community backing for Aggies for Limbs' mission.

outcome.achievement: Successful spring fundraiser with strong attendance despite rain

gallery.alt: Boot Scootin' BBQ event logo featuring western boots and cowboy hat design in orange and red colors
Event banner with Boot Scootin' BBQ logo displayed outdoors at the venue

events.title: Fun Run for Prosthetics 2019
events.description: Our Fall 2019 semester culminated in this successful Fun Run event blessed with beautiful running weather and great company. The event brought together students, families, and community members for a morning of fitness and fundraising.

outcome.achievement: Raised over $10,000 to help provide prosthetics for our next angel

gallery.alt: Group photo of participants in running gear, wearing blue shorts and showing enthusiasm
Large group photo of all participants gathered under the finish line/banner
Small group of runners posing together on the course with fall foliage in background
Young child using a walker participating in the event, wearing a floral print top
Two participants posing together near a campus building, one in maroon shirt and one in Texas flag shorts
